def fact(n):
    if(n<=1):
        return 1
    else:
        r=1
        while n!=1:
           r=r*n
           n=n-1
        return r
def odd(n):
    if(n<=1):
        return 1
    else:
        k=1
        r=1
        while k<=n:
            r=r*k
            k+=2
        return r    
t=input()
while t:
    t=t-1
    n=input()-1
    print (pow(2,n)*odd(2*n-1)/fact(n+1))%10000
